resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/1913833104</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>1913833104</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of Endothermic Reactions</string>
            <string language="es">Demostración de reacciones endotérmicas</string>
            <string language="ga">Léiriú ar Imoibriú Inteirmeach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration der endothermischen Reaktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration des réactions endothermiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração de reações endothermic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione delle reazioni endotermiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη των ενδοθερμικών αντιδράσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Teacher demonstration illustrating and discussing endothermic chemical reactions and solid-solid reactions (using barium hydroxide crystals and solid ammonium thiocyanate).</string>
            <string language="es">Demostración del profesor que ilustra y expone las reacciones químicas endotérmicas y las reacciones sólidas-sólidas (se utilizan cristales de hidróxido de bario y tiocianato de amonio).</string>
            <string language="ga">Léiriú múinteora a thaispeánann agus a phléann imoibrithe inteirmeacha ceimiceacha agus imoibrithe solad-solad (ag úsáid criostail hiodrocsaíd bairiam agus amóiniam tiaicianáit soladach).</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrerdemonstration, die endothermische chemische
Reaktionen und Fest-Festreaktionen (mit Bariumhydroxidkristallen und 
festem Ammoniumschwefelcyanat) veranschaulicht und behandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de professeur illustrant et 
discutant des réactions chimiques endothermiques et des réactions 
solides-solides (en utilisant les cristaux d'hydroxyde de baryum et le
sulfocyanate plein d'ammonium).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração do professor que ilustra e que 
discute reações químicas endothermic e reações solid-solid 
(usando cristais do hydroxide de bário e o thiocyanate contínuo do 
ammonium).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione dell'insegnante che illustra e che 
discute le reazioni chimiche endotermiche e le reazioni solide solide 
(usando i cristalli dell'idrossido di bario ed il tiocianato solido 
dell'ammonio).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη δασκάλων που επεξηγεί και που συζητά τις 
ενδοθερμικές χημικές αντιδράσεις και τις solid-solid 
αντιδράσεις (χρησιμοποιώντας τα κρύσταλλα υδροξειδίου βάριου και 
το στερεό θειοκυανικό άλας αμμωνίου).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
